desc: The jewel rumored to be the origin of Marian's power.

dictionary.lore: The demon Marian usually acts alone. Originally, she didn't mingle with anyone besides her husband, but she showed no hints of her reclusive personality when fighting humans. She doesn't care for fighting other Fallen Gods, and spends her days opening the back gates in order to hunt humans. Will he come visit when the demon Marian returns to her beautiful, old self...?

name: Queen Jewel
